outputs.output_descr: The Department of Safety and Security is responsible for the implementation of the programme of work, as established by the General Assembly in its resolution 59/276. The purpose of the department is to enable the safest and most efficient conduct of the programmes and activities of the UN system by providing strategic leadership, operational support and oversight of the UN Security Management System

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
